document.full_text: geoscientists at the british geological survey (bgs) group asked members of the public for help on wednesday with observations of volcanic ash from the eruption of the grimsvotn volcano in iceland.
document.title: scientists ask britons to help map grimsvotn ash
lines_and_colors: geoscientists at the british geological survey (bgs) group asked members of the public for help on wednesday with observations of volcanic ash from the eruption of the grimsvotn volcano in iceland.
